hymn.title: At even when the sun was set
hymn.category: Divine Healing—Christ the Same as of Old

layout.singingstanza: At ev -- en when the sun was set, The sick, O Lord, a -- round Thee lay; O in what di -- vers pains they met! O with what joy they went a -- way!

lyrics.stanza: At even when the sun was set, The sick, O Lord, around Thee lay; O in what divers pains they met! O with what joy they went away!
Once more 'tis eventide, and we Oppressed with various ills draw near; What if Thy form we cannot see? We know and feel that Thou art here.
*And none, O Lord, have perfect rest, For none are wholly free from sin; And they who fain would serve Thee best Are conscious most of wrong within.
Vv. 4 and 5 may be omitted if hymn is sung for physical healing.
